title: Live updates: Fact-checking Trump's presidential inauguration
shortDescription: The USA TODAY Fact Check Team analyzes claims from Donald Trump's presidential inauguration.

title: TikTok restores US service after Trump's executive order promise
shortDescription: TikTok restored service to US users on January 19 after briefly going offline due to a federal ban requiring its parent company, ByteDance, to sell its US operations.

title: Biden pardons Fauci, Cheney, others to shield from Trump inquiries
shortDescription: President Biden preemptively pardons Dr. Anthony Fauci, former GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, retired Gen. Mark Milley to protect them from Trump inquiries.

title: Trump plans torrent of executive actions on eve of taking office
shortDescription: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans to sign a slew a executive orders on his first day in office.

title: Watch live: Donald Trump's inauguration inside the US Capitol
shortDescription: On Monday, President-elect Donald Trump will be sworn in as the 47th president in Washington, D.C.

title: Inauguration live updates: What to know before Trump takes the oath of office
shortDescription: The president-elect returned to Washington over the weekend, holding a rally for supporters. Follow along for the latest Monday.

title: Migrants, tent bans, higher rents could shape homelessness under Trump
shortDescription: The U.S. homeless population has increased by roughly 40% since Trump's first inauguration.

title: What time is Trump sworn in on Inauguration Day 2025? See full schedule
shortDescription: Inauguration Day 2025 is here. Here's what to know about the day's events and when Donald Trump is set to be sworn in.

title: Trump says he'll visit California on Friday to survey wildfire damage
shortDescription: The remarks come over a week after California Gov. Gavin Newsom invited Trump to visit the state and meet the victims impacted by the wildfires.

title: Trump proposes US own 50% of TikTok to save social media app
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump proposed the U.S. own half of TikTok to satisfy national security concerns and save the social media app.

title: Trump promises swift executive action at pre-Inauguration DC rally: 'We like winning'
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump took a victory lap on Inauguration Eve, where he previewed executive actions he plans to take on his first day in office.

title: President Trump proposes TikTok ‘joint venture’
shortDescription: Trump said he would back "a joint venture" where the U.S. would own TikTok with another partner, though he did not say if that could be ByteDance.

title: 'I'm not going anywhere,' Biden says in final full day as president
shortDescription: President Joe Biden traveled to South Carolina, the state that helped catapult him to the White House, on his final full day in office.

title: Washington, D.C. prepares for Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Washington, D.C. prepares as President-elect Donald Trump and Vice President-elect Sen. JD Vance (R-OH) will be sworn in on January 20.

title: Donald Trump says he'll issue executive order to delay TikTok ban
shortDescription: The president-elect Sunday pledged an executive order, hours into his second term, returning access for American users, at least temporarily.

title: More Biden pardons, including late civil rights leader Marcus Garvey
shortDescription: President Joe Biden pardoned five people on Sunday, including the late civil rights leader Marcus Garvey, and commuted the sentences of two.

title: Who is Kai Trump? What to know about the president's eldest grandchild
shortDescription: Donald Trump has five children and 10 grandchildren. Here's what to know about his eldest grandchild and avid golfer Kai Trump.

title: Who is Melania Trump? What to know about the president's wife
shortDescription: Here's what to know about Melania Trump, the former model and future first lady of the United States.

title: Trump plans 100 immediate executive actions: 'Shock and awe'
shortDescription: Donald Trump intends to start his second White House term by unleashing more than 100 executive orders and directives.

title: Trump poised for disruptive second term as Inauguration Day arrives
shortDescription: Trump 2.0 looks a lot like Trump 1.0 − unpredictable, tumultuous and with GOP infighting. It's also promising big changes that many voters wanted.

title: Who is Eric Trump? What to know about Trump's son
shortDescription: Eric Trump, 41, is the third child of Donald and the late Ivana Trump. Here's what to know about him as his dad returns to the White House.

title: Who is Ivanka Trump? What to know about the president's eldest daughter
shortDescription: Donald Trump's family members including his eldest daughter, Ivanka Trump and her husband Jared Kushner are expected to attend the inauguration.
